execution_quality: The agent performed systematic searches to locate mosh configuration, but the documentation/note that was supposed to be updated was not actually found or modified. The investigation was thorough but incomplete relative to the stated goal.
work_category: Investigation and documentation of existing system configuration. Agent searched for mosh setup details across multiple server configs to understand how it was previously configured.
summary: The agent conducted an appropriate investigation into mosh configuration across servers but failed to complete the core task of updating documentation. The follow-up message reveals the agent had a factual misunderstanding about where configuration files are located (thinking they're on skyhook when they're actually in ~/src/systems), indicating the investigation was based on incomplete context rather than thorough repository understanding.
follow_up_pattern: User immediately corrected a factual error in the agent's understanding (config location), suggesting the agent may have misunderstood where the configuration files actually live. This triggered a new, more focused task.
